summary.para: Creates a proxy to a byte stream. The proxy enables a media source to read from a byte stream in another process.

param.name: pByteStream
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the byte stream to proxy.

param.name: riid
param.para: The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested.

param.name: ppvObject
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates a proxy to a byte stream.

remarks.para: This interface provides a factory object for creating a proxy to an existing Microsoft Media Foundation byte stream. The CLSID of the factory object is CLSID_MFByteStreamProxyClassFactory.
